column4: here's something interesting. I can go to Actions->Play Media, select a .m4a file, and it plays. it seems to be unable to parse the metadata though. I wonder if that's why scanning my configured folders doesn't add them to the collection
I had this same problem,  I was forced to convert my collection to mp3
fortunately only about 50 files out of my nearly 3000 are currently .m4a, the rest are mp3
theres a tool called Jhymm that will convert them
